toc.value: Async/Await allows us to write code like this:

frontMatter.title: JavaScript Promise and Async/Await
frontMatter.summary: A short visual guide on what a Promise is in JavaScript, and how to avoid call back hell.

prev.title: How to type the setState function from the useState hook
prev.author: Dale Larroder
prev.summary: A deep dive into how to properly type a setState function from the useState hook.

next.title: Web Sockets
next.summary: Web sockets are a way to communicate between a client and a server. They are used in real-time applications like chat apps, multiplayer games, and more.
